sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Disable all click metrics scheduled triggers(across nodes) if they have been enabled by setting this property com.glide.cs.click_metrics.event_enabled to true</description> <name>Disable click metrics scheduled triggers</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[disableClickMetricsSysTriggers();
function disableClickMetricsSysTriggers() { global.VAClickMetrics.updateClickMetricsScheduleJobTriggerType(false); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-02-28 08:13:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>133bc06177d16110f14a24f1cd5a9919</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Disable click metrics scheduled triggers</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">ad7df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f75</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_133bc06177d16110f14a24f1cd5a9919</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-01 00:31:05</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
